songs.full_title: A Million Dreams by Ziv Zaifman, Hugh Jackman & Michelle Williams
songs.title: A Million Dreams

primary_artist.name: Ziv Zaifman, Hugh Jackman & Michelle Williams

description.plain:
P.T. is singing to Charity about what he dreams for his future when they’re kids. They sing together as adults later on.

This beginning also shows the course of his life with his father until his father dies and then when he had to make a living for himself at a young age. This is crucial because later in the movie this is what motivates him to try to impress Charity and her parents and to show the world that he does have something to give.

They sing of hope and imagination. They sing of optimism and positive outlook on life instead of looking for the bad in life, seeing the good. They don’t say what the world should be but what it could be and that their dreams if they work for it, will come true.

body.plain:
P.T. is singing to Charity about what he dreams for his future when they’re kids. They sing together as adults later on.

This beginning also shows the course of his life with his father until his father dies and then when he had to make a living for himself at a young age. This is crucial because later in the movie this is what motivates him to try to impress Charity and her parents and to show the world that he does have something to give.

They sing of hope and imagination. They sing of optimism and positive outlook on life instead of looking for the bad in life, seeing the good. They don’t say what the world should be but what it could be and that their dreams if they work for it, will come true.

songs.artist: Ziv Zaifman, Hugh Jackman & Michelle Williams
songs.lyrics:
146 ContributorsA Million Dreams Lyrics[Verse 1: Ziv Zaifman]
I close my eyes and I can see
A world that's waiting up for me
That I call my own
Through the dark, through the door
Through where no one's been before
But it feels like home

[Pre-Chorus: Ziv Zaifman]
They can say, they can say it all sounds crazy
They can say, they can say I've lost my mind
I don't care, I don't care, so call me crazy
We can live in a world that we design
[Chorus: Ziv Zaifman]
'Cause every night I lie in bed
The brightest colors fill my head
A million dreams are keepin' me awake
I think of what the world could be
A vision of the one I see
A million dreams is all it's gonna take
Oh, a million dreams for the world we're gonna make

[Verse 2: Ziv Zaifman]
There's a house we can build
Every room inside is filled
With things from far away
Special things I compile
Each one there to make you smile
On a rainy day

[Pre-Chorus: Ziv Zaifman]
They can say, they can say it all sounds crazy
They can say, they can say we've lost our minds
I don't care, I don't care if they call us crazy
Run away to a world that we design

[Chorus: Hugh Jackman]
Every night I lie in bed
The brightest colors fill my head
A million dreams are keepin' me awake
I think of what the world could be
A vision of the one I see
A million dreams is all it's gonna take
Oh, a million dreams for the world we're gonna make
You might also like[Bridge: Michelle Williams, Michelle & Hugh]
However big, however small
Let me be part of it all
Share your dreams with me
You may be right, you may be wrong
But say that you'll bring me along
To the world you see
To the world I close my eyes to see
I close my eyes to see

[Chorus: Hugh Jackman, Michelle Williams, Both]
'Cause every night I lie in bed
The brightest colors fill my head
A million dreams are keepin' me awake
A million dreams, a million dreams
I think of what the world could be
A vision of the one I see
A million dreams is all it's gonna take
A million dreams for the world we're gonna make

[Outro: Hugh Jackman & Michelle Williams]
For the world we're gonna make85Embed
